summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Transportation and Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the Director of the Department of Transportation to acquire, accept, and record, on behalf of the City of Seattle, a permanent easement located in a portion of Lot 28, Block 3 of Patten's Addition to the City of Seattle for the purpose of slope stabilization; authorizing the Director of Seattle Public Utilities to acquire, accept and record, on behalf of the City of Seattle, two permanent easements located in portions of Lots 2 and 3, Block 2 of Patten's Addition to the City of Seattle for drainage infrastructure that contributes to slope stabilization and area drainage; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
